name: Fluent, Inc.
tag_list: marketing, advertising, performance-marketing, co-registration, lead-generation, monetization, mobile-advertising, affiliate-network
overview:
Fluent, Inc. is a digital performance marketing company bridging the gap between advertisers and publishers to provide integrated solutions for online customer acquisition and monetization through a pay-for-performance model.

Fluent’s technology leverages both proprietary and third party data on the web, mobile web and in-app to ensure that each ad served targets the right consumers where they’re most likely to engage and generates the best quality leads for our advertisers, which include brands such as Pepsi, Smart Balance, P&G as well as several direct marketers. The company also allows its website owners and app developers the unique ability to own their environment, determining when and where ads are served, which has enabled Fluent to partner with publishers such as Pandora, Yahoo! Sports, and Publishers Clearing House.
